pullrequest.title: Grant permission to optional Admin Identity upon metric creation.

content.raw: this one is tricky :) . This success block should be sent in 2 scenarios: 1) when there is no admin_identify (ie. when the admin_identity permissions block is not executed, from an ELSE). 2) The other is from inside the callback of the admin_identity callback.
content.html: this one is tricky :) . This success block should be sent in 2 scenarios: 1) when there is no admin_identify (ie. when the admin_identity permissions block is not executed, from an ELSE). 2) The other is from inside the callback of the admin_identity callback.
